example.parse: (PP-DIR (P 对) (NP (CP (WHNP-1 (-NONE- *OP*)) (CP (IP (NP-SBJ (-NONE- *T*-1)) (VP (VP (VP (VV 隐瞒)) (VP (ADVP (AD 不)) (VP (VV 报)))) (PU 、) (VP (VP-FOC (VV 制止)) (VP (DVP (AD 不)) (VP (VV 力)))))) (DEC 的)))))

(IP (NP-SBJ (CP (WHNP-1 (-NONE- *OP*)) (CP (IP (NP-SBJ (-NONE- *T*-1)) (VP (PP-PRP (P 因) (NP (ADJP (JJ 特殊)) (NP (NN 情况)))) (ADVP (AD 不)) (VP (VV 能) (VP (ADVP (AD 同步)) (VP (VV 缴付)))))) (DEC 的)))) (PU ，) (VP (VV 应) (VP (VP (VV 报) (NP-OBJ (ADJP (JJ 原)) (NP (NN 审批) (NN 机构))) (IP (NP-SBJ (-NONE- *PRO*)) (VP (VV 批准)))) (PU ，) (CC 并) (VP (PP-MNR (P 按) (NP (NP (CP (WHNP-2 (-NONE- *OP*)) (CP (IP (NP-SBJ (-NONE- *pro*)) (VP (ADVP (AD 实际)) (VP (VV 缴付) (NP-OBJ (-NONE- *T*-2))))) (DEC 的))) (NP (NN 出资额))) (NP (NN 比例)))) (VP (VV 分配) (NP-OBJ (NN 收益)))))) (PU 。))
